name: AgeWage
slogan: Fintech start up helping people see how good their pensions are!
description:
The product we are building is an app / website. It will help people gather their pension pots into one place (screen) to see how much they've got, what they can do with it, and how well it is performing. The last part is the really exciting thing about what we're doing. We will be the first company to provide value for money scores for people's pension pots. We do this by using our bespoke algorithm which we have created through lots of hard work over the last year.

The value for money scores that we create will help the customer see how well each of their pension pots are performing based on historic performance. This will allow them to make a decision as to whether they would like to stick with the pension pots they have, consolidate all of them into one big pot or do a bit of both!

Our customer is anyone with a pension in the UK, but our target market are 40-55 year olds as they are closest to drawing out their pension.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
jobs.description:
Why join AgeWage?

AgeWage is an exciting FinTech start-up operating in the pensions market and is currently expanding its team.

The core of AgeWage is the AgeWage score which compares a pensionâ€™s performance against an index benchmark, which AgeWage co-developed with Morningstar. A score is then given out of 100 depending on how the pension performed compared to the index benchmark. 

Off the back of this score AgeWage is then able to offer specific financial products that are appropriate to each customer, based on the financial information they have provided. 

AgeWage also provides scheme analysis to pension providers, trustees and employers, meaning it operates in both the B2B and D2C markets. 

This is a chance to join a fast growing FinTech which is disrupting the pensions market with innovative technology and a fresh approach to solving the problem of how to help millions of people convert pension pots into retirement plans.
